ProShares Trust - UltraPro Short QQQ 2017 (SQQQ) has 3 splits in our SQQQ split history database. The first split for SQQQ took place on May 11, 2012. This was a 1 for 4 reverse split, meaning for each 4 shares of SQQQ owned pre-split, the shareholder now owned 1 share. For example, a 1000 share position pre-split, became a 250 share position following the split. SQQQ’s second split took place on January 24, 2014. This was a 1 for 4 reverse split, meaning for each 4 shares of SQQQ owned pre-split, the shareholder now owned 1 share. For example, a 250 share position pre-split, became a 62.5 share position following the split. SQQQ‘s third split took place on January 12, 2017. This was a 1 for 4 reverse split, meaning for each 4 shares of SQQQ owned pre-split, the shareholder now owned 1 share.
